# Get Lead Changes

# Description

Uses the Data Value Changes
                API to retrieve latest leads created or modified since the specified interval.

# Untitled Section

# Configuration

* 
* From date - Select the date and time after which the changes to leads are to be retrieved. Use the calendar widget to select a date. For example: 2022-09-06 or 2022-09-06T13:22:17. This field supports DateTimeOffset type input.









* Lead changes - Automatically generated output variable.
